headline: A Closer Look at Bank of New York Mellon’s (BK) Valuation After Its Strong Year-to-Date Share Price Rally
summary: Bank of New York Mellon (BK) has quietly put together a strong run, with the stock up almost 10% over the past 3 months and roughly 47% this year, outpacing many large financial peers. See our latest analysis for Bank of New York Mellon. That upswing sits on top of a powerful backdrop, with a roughly 47% year to date share price return and a very strong multi year total shareholder return, suggesting momentum and confidence are still building around BK’s earnings and efficiency story.
